SUB: Legal Cease, Desist Notice, Dutch Notice and Takedown Code of Conduct.



This is the legal department of (UTV Software Communications LTD). We have come to identify that your website / user is illegally duplicating and reproducing copyrighted material / File / Files . 

Stop duplicating the content and remove all infringing pages immediately. If you do not abide to this in the next 24 hours of this mail receipt, we will have to carry out legal proceedings against you. We will also release DMCA complaints as per Section 512 with all major search engines, hosting provider and your Ad partners. So your site will be banned permanently from the SE database and dropped from hosting. You will also be reported to all online crime control centers including the powerful internationally functional ic3.gov. 

DETAILS OF WORK:

Movie Name : Joker
Release Year : 2012
Production : UTV Software Communications Ltd.

Track Titles:
1) Kafirana
2) Jugnu
3) Sing Raja
4) Yeh Joker
5) Tears of Joker
6) Alien Arrival
